headline: A Look At Honeywell International (HON) Valuation After JPMorgan Upgrade And Aerospace Spinoff Plans
summary: Honeywell International (HON) is back in focus after JPMorgan upgraded the stock and highlighted upcoming business spinoffs, while a fresh legal settlement with Flexjet removed a long running overhang and extended their maintenance partnership. See our latest analysis for Honeywell International. Those moves come after a busy stretch, with Honeywell outlining leadership for its planned aerospace spinoff, announcing an AI enabled retail platform with Google Cloud and resolving long running...
